trans-unit.source: Defines a blend pattern for a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 为定义的混合模式<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Gradients are commonly used to smoothly shade the interiors of shapes.
trans-unit.target: 渐变通常用于顺利带有阴影的形状的内部。

trans-unit.source: A blend pattern is defined by two arrays (<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A>) that each contain the same number of elements.
trans-unit.target: 混合模式由两个数组 (<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A>)，每个包含相同数量的元素。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each element of the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A> array represents a proportion of the distance along the gradient line.
trans-unit.target: 每个元素<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A>数组均表示沿渐变线的距离的比例。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each element of the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A> array represents the proportion of the starting and ending colors in the gradient blend at the position along the gradient line represented by the corresponding element in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A> array.
trans-unit.target: 每个元素<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A>数组均表示的起始和结束位置沿渐变线中的相应元素所表示的渐变混合中的颜色的比例<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A>数组。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if corresponding elements of the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A> arrays are 0.2 and 0.3, respectively, for a linear gradient from blue to red along a 100-pixel line, the color 20 pixels along that line (20 percent of the distance) consists of 30 percent blue and 70 percent red.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果对应的元素<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A>，并且<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A>数组 0.2 和 0.3，分别是，从为直线 100 像素的红色的蓝色线性渐变的则沿行 （20%的距离) 的颜色 20 像素包含 30%蓝色和 70 %red.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend"></xref> class with the specified number of factors and positions.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend"></xref>的因素和位置的指定个数的类。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors*> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions*> arrays.
trans-unit.target: 中的元素数<> *1> 和<> *1> 数组。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of blend factors for the gradient.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的 blend 因素的渐变的数组。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the elements of this array are a value from 0.0f through 1.0f.
trans-unit.target: 通常，此数组的元素是一个介于 0.0 到 1.0 f f。

trans-unit.source: These elements specify the percentages of the ending color and the starting color to use at the corresponding blend position.
trans-unit.target: 这些元素指定的结束颜色和要使用在相应的起始颜色百分比 blend 位置。

trans-unit.source: For example, a value of 0.2 indicates that at the specified position, the blended color is composed of 20 percent of the ending gradient color and 80 percent of the starting gradient color.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值为 0.2 指示，指定位置的混合的颜色组成的渐变的结束颜色的 20%和 80%的起始渐变颜色。

trans-unit.source: An array of blend factors that specify the percentages of the starting color and the ending color to be used at the corresponding position.
trans-unit.target: 指定的起始颜色和要在相应位置使用的结束颜色的百分比的 blend 因素的数组。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of blend positions for the gradient.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数组的 blend 位置的渐变。

trans-unit.source: The elements of this array specify percentages of distance along the gradient line.
trans-unit.target: 此数组的元素指定距离沿渐变线的百分比。

trans-unit.source: For example, an element value of 0.2f specifies that this point is 20 percent of the total distance from the starting point.
trans-unit.target: 例如，元素值 0.2 f 指定此点为 20%的起始点的总距离。

trans-unit.source: The elements in this array are represented by float values between 0.0f and 1.0f.
trans-unit.target: 此数组中的元素由 0.0 f 和 1.0 f 之间的浮点值表示。

trans-unit.source: The first element of the array must be 0.0f, and the last element must be 1.0f.
trans-unit.target: 数组的第一个元素必须是 0.0 f，并且最后一个元素必须为 1.0 f。

trans-unit.source: An array of blend positions that specify the percentages of distance along the gradient line.
trans-unit.target: 指定沿渐变线的距离的百分比的 blend 位置的数组。
